channel.title: Need help with my client! please ( read it! )
channel.description: I have made my own client. but Idk how to remove to server ip of it. so iff they log they only log in my server....

item.title: Need help with my client! please ( read it! )
item.dc:creator: @kirmizi_kalp kirmizi_kalp
item.description:
@kirmizi_kalp wrote:

[quote=“Rog3r, post:2, topic:215683”]Dude - stop spamming the client hacking forums… only use this for tuts!!
Go to devo and help.

(Even after you have been moderated for spamming!)[/quote]

i said i am new! & i am bad with english! idk what section i should post to

Read full topic
